extendedInfo.description: FATY is a CRM (Customer Relationship Management) for smartphones. Incorporates a number of features for managing customers, products, orders, quotes, payments, invoices, and activities.Allows the creation of customizable invoices in Excel format, to be sent to the customer as a quote or as a receipt for your order.Key Features:- Customer an Company Management (with import from the phone book of the mobile phone)- Product Catalogue Management (with barcode reading through your phone's camera* )- Orders and Quotes (Creating orders and quote produced by adding Products from the Catalogue. Products can be customized without changing the original product)- Manage payments- Invoice Management  (with export to excel and pdf files, with customizable templates with logo and company details)- Management ActivitiesFor information, reports and feature requests, please send an email to enginapp2012@gmail.com.Full App:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fat.activity* This functionality is provided by the application Barcode Scanner

reviews.title: Complicated
reviews.comment: Sorry either I\'m too dumb or this is over my head! Need instructions ... I need to create simple invoices except I need not to type every item over n over. I didn\'t get far enough with this to figure it out.
reviews.author: Fred R. S.

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Doing the job what I need to start my business this application safe me form typing on paper...
reviews.author: A Google User
